title: Ticket #246: New MachineAd attribute: DetectedCPUs
description: MachineAds currently advertise Cpus (CPUs for this slot) and TotalCpus (CPUs detected, possibly overwritten by NUM_CPUS, and maybe NUM_VMS). We should add DetectedCPUs, which is always the number of CPUs detected by the schedd and cannot be overwritten. This would be of use for administrators, and was requested by NMI.
remarks:
2009-Dec-17 17:07:21 by matt:
This exists in 7.4.0, DETECTED_CORES and DETECTED_MEMORY 

$ CONDOR_CONFIG=ONLY_ENV condor_config_val -dump | grep ^DETECTED
DETECTED_CORES = 2
DETECTED_MEMORY = 2005

Thank Dan.

2009-Dec-17 17:40:36 by adesmet:
The current fix isn't quite what this ticket asked for: the attributes don't appear in the machine ClassAd. However, there is a straightforward solution: use STARTD_ATTRS to export them. This seems Good Enough for now.
